title: Work & Study
part1: Do you work or are you a student?
What is your major/What are your main responsibilities?
What is the most interesting part of your work/studies?
What kind of work would you like to do in the future?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a job you would like to have in the future.
cue_card_points: what skills and qualifications you would need for this job
what the daily responsibilities would be
and explain why you are interested in this job.

part3: What are the most popular jobs for young people in your country?
Do you think it's more important to have a high salary or to have a job you enjoy?
How has technology changed the way people work in the last 10 years?
What is the impact of artificial intelligence on the future of work?
